turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm looking to get a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one that one I have the address. It's 13170 North Hazel Dell Parkway. It's Indianapolis.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. and what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want venti mocha caffè mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: with whole milk and.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much would it be to add caramel?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: caramel sauce is 50 cents.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: We'll go with that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will go with iced.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want a venti iced cafe mocha with whole milk and a drizzle of caramel sauce from starbucks on 13170 north hazeldale parkway.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the total is $4.50. Should i place the order for you now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the drink will be ready in 10 minutes. The receipt has been sent to your phone. Do u need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's all I need. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome.
